intro: ^! It's great to run into you."

s: ^Lila! It's great to run into you at the library. I was just dropping off some books.
^Hey Lila! It's good to see you. I was just dropping off some books.

Chat1: ^Lila?Smiling "Ooo. What did you pick up? I just checked out some new picture books for my class. I'm really excited to read them."

s: ^That sounds sweet. I'm just returning some cookbooks I took out. I managed to make some great chili yesterday.
^Aww that sounds sweet. I just got cookbooks. Hey, can I ask you a quick question?

Chat2: ^Lila?Smiling "Chili eh? I have a great recipe for vegan chili if you ever want to try it. It's so easy, the kids in my class make it with me."

s: ^Ooo. I may have to take you up on that. Oh, hey, can I ask you a question?
^I would love the recipe! Oh, actually while I have you, can I ask you a question?
^You got Mrs. Lee that volunteer position, right?
^Well, I think you got Mrs. lee that volunteer position, and I'm curious.

Explain2: ^Lila?Neutral "I did get Mrs. Lee a volunteer position. She's really wonderful with the children, and they love her."

s: ^That's good to hear. I was wondering if you could tell me more about the benefits of seniors volunteering?
^That's awesome to hear. Can you tell me more about that?

Suggestion1: ^Lila?Smiling "Oh there's lots of benefits too. You know, seniors can suffer from depression like all of us. Volunteering decreases depression."
^Lila?Smiling "Not just that, but volunteering can also increase mental cognition. Seniors can keep their minds active and sharp, just like Mrs. Lee!"
^Lila_Day 2_Volunteering in the community can help seniors' depression_Mrcalindas2

Suggestion1.#: notification Lila_Day 2_Volunteering in the community can help seniors' depression_Mrcalindas2

s: ^Wow. That sounds great, Lila. Do you have any more tips?
^This is so good to know. I knew I should have come to you.

Suggestion2: ^Lila?Smiling "Well, you know seniors can suffer depression especially after losing a spouse. So, that a thing."
^Lila?Smiling "There's so many different volunteering activities available. It just depends on what they like, and what makes them feel good."
^Lila_Day 2_Seniors can suffer from depression, especially after losing a spouse

Suggestion2.#: notification Lila_Day 2_Seniors can suffer from depression, especially after losing a spouse

Suggestion2: ^Lila_Day 2_There are many different types of activities available

Suggestion2.#: notification Lila_Day 2_There are many different types of activities available

s: ^Wow. That sounds great, Lila. Do you have any more tips?
^This is so good to know. I knew I should have come to you.

Goodbye: ^Lila?Smiling "Well, you know I'm happy to help. If you know any seniors looking for an opportunity the library and the community center are great places to start."
^Lila?Smiling "Don't be afraid to spread the word. I'm going to check these out. Catch you soon,

s: ^I'll call you later for that chili recipe, okay? Thanks so much Lila! Have an awesome day!
